atk-s0401a19:1_0: 600-611.Amataṁte, bhikkhave, na paribhuñjantīti maraṇavirahitaṁ nibbānaṁ na paribhuñjantīti
atk-s0401a19:1_1: attho. Nanu ca nibbānaṁ lokuttaraṁ, kāyagatāsati lokiyā, kathaṁ taṁ paribhuñjantā
atk-s0401a19:1_2: amataṁ paribhuñjantīti? Taṁ bhāvetvā adhigantabbato. Kāyagatañhi satiṁ bhāvento amatamadhigacchati,
atk-s0401a19:1_3: abhāvento nādhigacchati. Tasmā evaṁ vuttaṁ. Etenupāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a19:1_4: Api cettha viraddhanti virādhitaṁ nādhigataṁ. Āraddhanti paripuṇṇaṁ. Pamādiṁsūti
atk-s0401a19:1_5: pamajjanti. Pamuṭṭhanti sammuṭṭhaṁ vissaritaṁ naṭṭhaṁ vā. Āsevitanti ādito sevitaṁ.
atk-s0401a19:1_6: Bhāvitanti vaḍḍhitaṁ. Bahulīkatanti punappunaṁ kataṁ. Anabhiññātanti ñātaabhiññāya
atk-s0401a19:1_7: ajānitaṁ. Apariññātanti ñātapariññāvaseneva apariññātaṁ. Asacchikatanti apaccakkhakataṁ.
